'''Ridge Watch''' is a [[Domain]] located in the mountainous area that connects Mondstadt and Liyue. Clearing this domain gives [[Artifacts]]. Challenge domains with higher levels to get better rewards.

==Ley Line Disorder==
The following Ley Line Disorders are applied in this domain:

''Every level in this domain has the same Ley Line Disorder.''
{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!align="center" rowspan=1 | I – IV
|A backlash will occur when opponents hit a character protected by a shield, unleashing a shockwave originating at the attacking opponent's position that deals one instance of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 2s.
|}

===Damage===
{{See also|Level Scaling/Reaction#Level Multiplier}}
The {{Color|Physical DMG}} dealt by the shockwaves is calculated as <math>10 \times \text{Element Level Multiplier}</math>. This DMG is affected by the target [[Physical RES]], but unaffected by [[DEF]]. The final result is rounded down.

{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;"
! Level !! Base Damage
|-

==Enemies==
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Ridge Watch I
|objective=Defeat 10 enemies in less than 6:00 minutes
|enemies=Pyro Slime*2,Large Pyro Slime*4,Hilichurl Berserker*4
}}
*One of the '''Large Pyro Slime''' is empowered and will periodically spawn a '''Pursuing Fireball''' that explodes three times once it reaches the player, dealing {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. During these three explosions, it remains stationary but will shift towards the player again for two more cycles.
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Ridge Watch II
|objective=Defeat 8 enemies in less than 5:00 minutes
|enemies=Hilichurl Berserker*4,Blazing Axe Mitachurl*3,Large Pyro Slime
}}
*One of the '''Large Pyro Slime''' and one of the '''Blazing Axe Mitachurl''' is empowered and will periodically spawn a '''Pursuing Fireball''' that explodes three times once it reaches the player, dealing {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. During these three explosions, it remains stationary but will shift towards the player again for two more cycles.
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Ridge Watch III
|objective=Defeat 10 enemies in less than 6:00 minutes
|enemies=Large Pyro Slime*5,Blazing Axe Mitachurl*4,Rock Shieldwall Mitachurl
}}
*Two of the '''Large Pyro Slimes''', one of the '''Blazing Axe Mitachurl''' and the '''Rock Shieldwall Mitachurl''' is empowered and will periodically spawn a '''Pursuing Fireball''' that explodes three times once it reaches the player, dealing {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. During these three explosions, it remains stationary but will shift towards the player again for two more cycles.

==Trivia==
* The level names of the domain are all 'Unyielding' which likely refers to how the Ley Line Disorder gives benefits when an enemy hits your shield.
